name: @jscrpt/common
description: Common javascript tools, utilities and other usefull stuff

scripts.build: npm run tsc -- --declaration --declarationDir . --declarationMap && npm run tsc -- -t es2015 --outDir es2015 && npm run tsc -- -t es2015 --outDir es && npm run tsc -- -t es2020 --outDir es2020 && npm run tsc -- -t es2015 --outDir module -m CommonJS && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs
scripts.clean: rimraf temp es es5 es2015 es2020 module **/tsdoc-metadata.json src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.d.ts.map rxjs/**/*.d.ts rxjs/**/*.d.ts.map ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:cjs: npm run build:cjs:rename && npm run build:cjs:replace:map && npm run build:cjs:replace:relative
scripts.build:mjs: npm run build:mjs:rename && npm run build:mjs:replace:map && npm run build:mjs:replace:relative
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:common && npm run doc:generate:rxjs && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs js-common" && git pull && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:common: rimraf docs/content/api/js-common && npm run doc:json:common && npm run doc:md:common
scripts.doc:md:common: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/js-common && rimraf temp
scripts.doc:generate:rxjs: rimraf docs/content/api/js-common-rxjs && npm run doc:json:rxjs && npm run doc:md:rxjs
scripts.doc:md:rxjs: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/js-common-rxjs && rimraf temp

author: kukjevov
